name: Paw find Surprise
description:
Dear little rescuers, today we invite you in the most amazing adventure in magic world! Little dog will find surprise eggs where hidden toys for kids! A lot of surprises there are in the locations!
Want to help puppy to find toys? Lets start the adventure! Going to the magic garden and be attentive! Tap on the egg and eat the chocolate, yummy, this is a magic toy! You need to find six eggs in the garden! In the egg you will see half of toy! You need to find the second half! Going to the collection room! What toys do you still lack?
Going to the tower in dog room! There are a lot of toys, beauty tools, and items of little rescuers! See attentive and find the egg! After your searching you can go to the beach! Near the sea you can have a rest and playing with little puppy! It is very fun! Make a big collection of toys! If you can not find the egg, you can take a hit of paw! Just click on the magnifier button!
Wish you good game and interesting search!
